## getMethodNames() function

Gets all method names from a class target and optionally its prototype chain

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getMethodNames(target: any, isSelfProperties?: boolean): string[];
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

target


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The class target to get method names from


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

isSelfProperties


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, only returns methods defined on the target class itself


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string\[\]

Array of method names as strings
